argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_is2ndc | |- ( J e. 2ndc <-> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( x e. TopBases /\ ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) -> ( topGen ` x ) = J ) |
| 3 |  | #P_tgcl | |- ( x e. TopBases -> ( topGen ` x ) e. Top ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( x e. TopBases /\ ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) -> ( topGen ` x ) e. Top ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( x e. TopBases /\ ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_rexlimiva | |- ( E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_sylbi | |- ( J e. 2ndc -> J e. Top ) |
